body.head: Samuel Lublinski (born Johannisburg, E. Prussia, 1868; died Weimar, 1910)

div.p: Samuel Lublinski (born Johannisburg, E. Prussia, 1868; died Weimar, 1910), German author, literary critic, and essayist. Among his publications was Die Entstehung des Christentums aus der antiken Kultur [The emergence of christianity from the culture of the ancient world], in the series Der urchristliche Erdkreis und sein Mythos [The primitive christian world and its mythology], vol. I (Jena: Diedrichs, 1910).
